title: Blood.Has.Been.Shed - Spirals/Novella Of Uriel (2 albums) [Mp3]
description:
Blood.Has.Been.Shed - Spirals/Novella Of Uriel

*PLEASE NOTE: IF YOU HAVE A REQUEST FOR MP4 MOVIES OR METAL MUSIC POST A COMMENT ON MY NEWEST UPLOAD. THANKS AND HAPPY PIRATING*

Here are two albums from the band Blood Has Been Shed. 25 songs, 90 minutes.

SPIRALS:
Spirals is the third album by Mathcore band Blood Has Been Shed. The album is known for its far superior production than their debut I Dwell On Thoughts Of You and their follow up effort Novella of Uriel which have a more muddied sound. The album was released March 11, 2003, and is their third full-length album. This is also the last record recorded with Blood Has Been Shed before Justin Foley also joined Killswitch Engage, Howard Jones at this point was already a member. The first, and only single, from the album is She Speaks to Me.

Release Date.......: March 11, 2003
Genre..............: Mathcore
Label..............: Roadrunner Records
Tracks.............: 14
Rating.............: 6/10

NOVELLA OF URIEL:
Novella Of Uriel is the second album by Mathcore band Blood Has Been Shed. It was released in the United States on February 20, 2001, on Ferret Records.

Release Date.......: Feb 13, 2001
Genre..............: Mathcore
Label..............: Ferret Records
Tracks.............: 11
Rating.............: 6/10
